main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimSecurity] Script Date: 18/09/2012 16:34:22 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblDimSecurity]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblDimSecurity]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimSecurity] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblDimSecurity]( [DimSecurityID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [SecurityNo] [varchar](50) NOT NULL, [Region] [varchar](50) NULL, [MetropolitanFlag] as (Case When CHARINDEX(''Metropolitan'', Region) <> 0 Then ''Y'' Else ''N'' End), [State] [varchar](50) NULL, [Suburb] [varchar](50) NULL, [PostCode] [varchar](10) NULL, [CountryCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [PropertyTypeCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [PropertyTypeDesc] [varchar](200) NULL, [OrganisationCode] [varchar](10) NULL, [OccupancyPurposeCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [OccupancyPurposeDesc] [varchar](50) NULL, [Status] [varchar](20) NULL, [StaticSecurityFlag] [varchar](10) NULL, [InvestmentPropertyFlag] [varchar](2) NULL, [Nature] [varchar](20) NULL, [SecurityAdr1] [varchar](50) NULL, [SecurityAdr2] [varchar](50) NULL, [SecurityAdr3] [varchar](50) NULL, [SecurityAdr4] [varchar](50) NULL, [SecurityAdr5] [varchar](50) NULL, [Tenure] [varchar](20) NULL, [Type] [varchar](20) NULL, [ValuationType] [varchar](20) NULL, [DateCreated] [datetime] NULL, [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [MortgageNumber] varchar(30) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_tblDimSecurity] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimSecurityID] ASC, [DimPoolID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
